response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your high standards. This product is truly exceptional, offering unparalleled value and benefits that align perfectly with your needs. Given its unique features and the quality it embodies, we believe it's worth more than $10,000 to you. However, to facilitate a transaction, I propose a special introductory offer for you. For a limited time, you can acquire this product for $9,500. This is an exclusive opportunity to own something that is not only valuable but also holds significant personal importance to you. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 9500}
